        creates a beam helper given different parameters
        Parameters:
        rotation - The inital rotation of the projectile
        damage - The damage dealt by the projectile
        tower - The tower that the projectile came from
        laser - The laser turret which the projectile came from

      • checkAndRemove

        public void checkAndRemove()
        Description copied from class: Projectile
        Checks if the projectile has collided with an enemy. If the projectile contacts an enemy, the enemy takes damage and the projectile is removed. Also removes the projectile if it is at the edge of the world.
        Overrides:
        checkAndRemove in class Projectile
